attributes.action: Surjeet Thind in Northamptons bus station to open new shop in the New Northgate interchange
attributes.additional_details: Surjeet Thind newsagents will close when the bus station closes, but my personal view is that they shpuld get offered a new shop with the same rent when the Northgate interchange is open, it would be sad to see them go they should be givin an opportunity to reopen
